iti67:1.1: This was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
iti67:2.1: “Mendicants, there are these three kinds of sagacity.
iti67:2.3: Sagacity of body, speech, and mind.
iti67:2.4: These are the three kinds of sagacity.”
iti67:2.5: That is what the Buddha said.
iti67:3.1: “A sage in body, a sage in speech,
iti67:3.4: has washed off all bad things, they say.”
iti67:4.1: This too was spoken by the Blessed One: that is what I heard.
